pylapp.tapster.client.android.vox

Class AndroidTextToSpeechSkeleton

  • pylapp.tapster.client.android.vox.AndroidTextToSpeechSkeleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextToSpeechStub

    public class AndroidTextToSpeechSkeleton
implements TextToSpeechStub

    Skeleton based on design pattern Bridge which provides the definitions of methods to call so as to deal with TTS features. This pattern is used so as to avoid an activity or something else to have too many dependencies and code about the way TTS is made. A library may be used, so let's thing a step further in case of the death of this library.

    This class is also based on design pattern Proxy so as to simplify the use of the native TTS system

        public AndroidTextToSpeechSkeleton()

        Skeleton based on design pattern Bridge which provides the definitions of methods to call so as to deal with TTS features. This pattern is used so as to avoid an activity or something else to have too many dependencies and code about the way TTS is made.
